name: ls-points-generator
description: ![GitHub tag (latest by date)](https://img.shields.io/github/tag-date/jjcapellan/ls-points-generator.svg) ![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/jjcapellan/ls-points-generator.svg) # LS-POINTS-GENERATOR **LsPointsGenerator** is a javascript class to generate a 2d map based on the L-system ([Lindenmayer system](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/L-system)).
author: Juan Jose Capellan
